header_text: You have just had your first child. You want to have a good relationship throughout your kid's life, but you worry about making mistakes as a parent. When your child is an adult, you believe that relationship will be strained.

elements.text: You recently welcomed your first grandchild. You want to have a good relationship throughout your grandchild's life, but you worry about making mistakes as a grandparent. When your grandchild is an adult, you believe that relationship will be...
